channel.title: Adding npc drops without having NPC Drop files?
channel.description:
Yo guys, im looking through my sever (im gonna add npc drops) but theres nothing about npc drops, no cfg files, no class files, no java files!!
How would i do npc drops?? I tryed copying npc drops over from devloution, class file, java file n cfg file, but just get 100 errors :(
Is there any way to add npc drops via clientr, or maybe npc handler?
Please help!! ~Johno
(just so you know, there is NOTHING on my server with incorporates npc drops, ill do a screenshot.)
Screenshot-
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll245/mjownzu_07/drops.jpg[/img]
